date: 2024-09-16T12:00:00.000+08:00
desc: The introduction of the brand-new Destyler, offering a greater variety of advanced UX experiences.
author:
  - https://github.com/elonehoo.png
---

## Brand New

In this version, we have revised some of the Destyler code, allowing for a better experience when using and developing Destyler.

- add all components slots type. [#64](https://github.com/destyler/destyler/pull/64)

- update the hook, add types to emits. [#62](https://github.com/destyler/destyler/pull/62)

- rework each component's handling of props and name. [#58](https://github.com/destyler/destyler/pull/58)

## Props

We have modified the way we handle the `name` and `props` of components. In the next version, we will change the way components are imported from `import { DestylerAlert } from 'destyler'` to `import { Alert } from 'destyler'`, which will make it easier to use the components.

We have also made changes to some related `props`, such as the `width` and `height` of `MenuArrow`. We have changed these `props` to directly use the `width` and `height` of `Arrow`, which will make our development process clearer.

After this, we have thought about and verified how to make the DX of the components more perfect. We have modified the way `Emits` are imported, and you can see the new way of our component Emits in the Vue.js [playground](https://play.vuejs.org/#), which means we have added `Emits` types when using the components.

To enrich the types of the components, we have also added slot types to each component. Although this is only useful when developing Destyler.

## Upgrading

As usual, our recommendation for upgrading is to run:

<CodeGroupPackage name="destyler@0.0.4" />
